description: 5 Exams đầu tiên (Level A1-B1). Mỗi đề gồm 20 câu hỏi.

exams.title: Exam 01: Beginner General English (A1)
exams.description: Kiểm tra kiến thức cơ bản: Hiện tại đơn, từ vựng gia đình, số đếm.

exams.title: Exam 02: Elementary Grammar Focus (A2)
exams.description: Tập trung vào thì Quá khứ đơn, Tương lai gần và So sánh.

exams.title: Exam 03: TOEIC Foundation (Listening & Reading)
exams.description: Làm quen với format TOEIC Part 1 (Mô tả tranh) và Part 5 (Điền từ).

exams.title: Exam 04: IELTS Speaking & Writing (Basic)
exams.description: Thực hành Speaking Part 1 và Writing Task 1 dạng đơn giản.

exams.title: Exam 05: Vocabulary by Topic (Jobs & Travel)
exams.description: Kiểm tra từ vựng theo chủ đề Nghề nghiệp và Du lịch.

questions.content_text: I ______ a student.
She ______ in London.
My mother's sister is my ______.
What is the number after nine?
______ you like coffee?
This is ______ book.
We eat breakfast in the ______.
There ______ two cars in the garage.
The opposite of 'big' is ______.
He ______ not play football.
Listen: What time is it? (Audio: 'It's five o'clock')
Read: 'Open Mon-Fri, 9am-5pm'. Is it open on Sunday?
They ______ (be) happy.
Monday, Tuesday, ______, Thursday.
Read aloud: 'The cat is on the table.'
Write 3 sentences about yourself.
Can you ______ swim?
I write with a ______.
Listen: What is her name? (Audio: 'My name is Sarah')
Read: 'DANGER - DO NOT ENTER'. What should you do?
Yesterday, I ______ to the park.
She is ______ than me.
We ______ going to visit Paris next week.
Have you ever ______ sushi?
I was sleeping when the phone ______.
You ______ smoke here. It's forbidden.
This is the boy ______ lives next door.
I don't have ______ money.
If it rains, we ______ stay at home.
He drives ______.
The book was ______ (write) by JK Rowling.
I enjoy ______ (read) books.
Where ______ you buy that shirt?
It is the ______ movie I have ever seen.
She has been here ______ 2 hours.
I would like ______ a coffee.
There isn't ______ milk in the fridge.
She is interested ______ music.
Whose bag is this? It's ______.
Look at those clouds! It ______ rain.
(Photo: Man fixing a car) A. He is driving a bus. B. He is repairing a vehicle. C. He is buying a tire. D. He is washing the window.
(Photo: Women in a meeting) A. They are eating lunch. B. They are shaking hands. C. They are looking at a document. D. They are standing outside.
(Photo: Planes at airport) A. The planes are flying. B. The planes are on the ground. C. The pilot is boarding. D. The airport is closed.
(Photo: Shelf with books) A. The shelf is empty. B. The books are organized. C. The man is reading. D. The library is full.
(Photo: People crossing street) A. Cars are stopped. B. People are walking across the street. C. The light is red. D. The bus is leaving.
Ms. Johnson ______ the marketing team last month.
Please review the attached ______ before the meeting.
The new printer is ______ faster than the old one.
All employees are required to ______ the safety workshop.
We apologize ______ the inconvenience.
The CEO is responsible ______ making final decisions.
Despite the rain, the event was ______ successful.
Please sign the contract and return it ______.
Our sales have increased ______ 20% this year.
We need to hire ______ staff members.
The package will be delivered ______ three business days.
Mr. Lee is a ______ negotiation expert.
______ you have any questions, please contact us.
The hotel offers ______ breakfast.
Production has been halted ______ a mechanical failure.
Do you work or are you a student?
What do you like to do in your free time?
Tell me about your hometown.
Do you prefer tea or coffee? Why?
How often do you use the internet?
Describe your favorite type of weather.
Do you like to travel?
What is your favorite color?
Tell me about your family.
Do you enjoy cooking?
Task 1: The table shows the number of students in 3 classes. Summarize the information. (Class A: 20, B: 25, C: 30).
Task 1: Describe the process of making coffee based on the diagram (Grind beans -> Boil water -> Pour).
Task 2: Some people say it's better to live in the city than the countryside. Do you agree or disagree?
Task 2: Write about the advantages and disadvantages of using mobile phones.
Task 1: You lost your bag at the airport. Write a letter to the lost and found department.
Task 1: Write an email to a friend inviting them to your birthday party.
Task 2: Should students wear uniforms at school?
Task 2: Is it important to learn a second language? Why?
Task 1: Describe the changes in the town map from 2000 to 2020.
Task 2: What are the causes of traffic jams in big cities? Suggest solutions.
A person who flies a plane is a ______.
A person who cooks in a restaurant is a ______.
I need to buy a ______ to travel by train.
You need a ______ to travel to another country.
A person who designs buildings is an ______.
We stayed in a 5-star ______.
The ______ brings food to your table.
We went on a guided ______ of the city.
A person who helps sick people is a ______.
I packed my clothes in my ______.
The flight was ______ by two hours.
He works ______ a factory.
She is a ______ at a university.
We bought some ______ for our friends.
A person who puts out fires is a ______.
I like to take ______ when I travel.
He is currently ______; he has no job.
We went ______ in the mountains.
A ______ fixes leaks and pipes.
The train arrived at the ______.

description: Exams 6-10 (Level A2-B1). Tập trung vào TOEIC Listening/Reading và Ngữ pháp trung cấp.

exams.title: Exam 06: Intermediate Grammar (B1)
exams.description: Kiểm tra Câu điều kiện, Câu bị động và Mệnh đề quan hệ.

exams.title: Exam 07: Vocabulary (Health & Education)
exams.description: Từ vựng chủ đề Sức khỏe và Giáo dục (Level B1).

exams.title: Exam 08: TOEIC Listening Part 2 & 3
exams.description: Hỏi đáp nhanh (Part 2) và Hội thoại ngắn (Part 3).

exams.title: Exam 09: TOEIC Reading Part 5 & 6
exams.description: Điền từ vào câu và đoạn văn (Business Context).

exams.title: Exam 10: Speaking & Writing (Intermediate)
exams.description: Kỹ năng nói và viết B1: Mô tả tranh chi tiết và Viết thư phản hồi.

questions.content_text: If I ______ you, I would study harder.
The house ______ built in 1990.
I haven't finished my homework ______.
You ______ wear a uniform at school. It's the rule.
She asked me where ______.
I used ______ to the gym, but now I don't.
The man ______ car was stolen is my neighbor.
It's too cold ______ outside.
Do you mind ______ the window?
While I ______ dinner, the phone rang.
He is ______ young to drive a car.
She has ______ money than him.
I look forward to ______ you soon.
Unless you hurry, you ______ the bus.
The phone ______ invented by Bell.
She said she ______ come to the party.
I wish I ______ rich.
By the time we arrived, the movie ______.
Neither John ______ Mary went to the meeting.
Despite ______, we went out.
The doctor gave me a ______ for medicine.
She has a high ______.
He broke his leg and needs a ______.
I have a university ______ in History.
If you pass the exam, you get a ______.
Common ______ of the flu include fever and cough.
He is the ______ of the school.
The nurse took my blood ______.
She wants to ______ for a course at the college.
He needs to ______ an operation.
The university campus has a large ______.
You should ______ an appointment with the dentist.
My favorite ______ at school was Mathematics.
It took him weeks to ______ from the illness.
Students must attend all ______.
She has a terrible ______.
He won a ______ to study abroad.
A ______ treats animals.
Tuition ______ have increased this year.
Regular exercise is good for your ______ health.
Q: When does the meeting start? A. In Conference Room B. B. At 2 PM. C. Yes, I am going.
Q: Who is responsible for the project? A. Mr. Smith is. B. It's due tomorrow. C. In the main office.
Q: How do I get to the station? A. By train. B. Turn left at the corner. C. It takes 10 minutes.
Q: Why was the flight cancelled? A. To New York. B. Because of the storm. C. At 5 o'clock.
Q: Would you like coffee or tea? A. Yes, please. B. I prefer coffee. C. It's hot.
Q: Did you finish the report? A. No, not yet. B. It's on the desk. C. I reported it.
Q: Where did you put the file? A. It was heavy. B. On the top shelf. C. Yesterday.
Q: How much does this cost? A. It's twenty dollars. B. It's very nice. C. I bought it.
Q: Is Mr. Jones in today? A. No, he's on vacation. B. He is a manager. C. Yes, I like him.
Q: When will the package arrive? A. By courier. B. Tomorrow afternoon. C. It's a big box.
(Conversation: Booking a hotel) Where does the woman want to stay? A. Near the airport. B. Downtown. C. By the beach. D. Near the station.
When is she arriving? A. Monday. B. Tuesday. C. Wednesday. D. Friday.
What does the man offer to do? A. Pick her up. B. Book the room. C. Pay the bill. D. Call a taxi.
(Conversation: Office problem) What is the problem? A. The printer is broken. B. The internet is down. C. The AC is not working. D. The coffee machine is empty.
Who will fix it? A. The manager. B. The technician. C. The woman. D. The receptionist.
When will it be fixed? A. Before lunch. B. This afternoon. C. Tomorrow. D. Next week.
(Conversation: Restaurant) How many people is the table for? A. Two. B. Three. C. Four. D. Five.
What time is the reservation? A. 6:00. B. 7:00. C. 7:30. D. 8:00.
What dietary requirement do they have? A. Vegetarian. B. Gluten-free. C. No nuts. D. Dairy-free.
What will the man do next? A. Call his friends. B. Go to the restaurant. C. Check the menu. D. Cancel the booking.
The marketing director ______ a new strategy yesterday.
We are looking for a ______ candidate for the position.
Please handle these glass vases ______.
The conference will be held ______ Chicago.
Employees ______ wish to attend must register online.
Your subscription will ______ expire next month.
We offer a wide ______ of services.
The cost of living has risen ______.
Mr. Brown is the ______ of the two candidates.
Access to the server is restricted to ______ personnel.
Part 6 (Email Gap 1): We are pleased to ______ you that...
Part 6 (Email Gap 2): ...your application has been ______.
Part 6 (Email Gap 3): Please report to the office ______ Monday.
Part 6 (Memo Gap 1): The elevator is currently out of ______.
Part 6 (Memo Gap 2): Technicians are ______ on the problem.
Part 6 (Memo Gap 3): We apologize for any ______ caused.
This product is available ______ in stores.
Guests are asked to ______ their keys at the desk.
The contract ______ by the lawyer right now.
______ the weather was bad, the flight departed on time.
Describe the picture (Busy Street Scene). 1 minute.
Describe the picture (Family Picnic). 1 minute.
Describe the picture (Office Meeting). 1 minute.
Talk about your last holiday. Where did you go?
Talk about your job or studies. What do you do?
Compare living in a house vs an apartment.
What are your plans for the future?
Describe your best friend.
How do you usually celebrate your birthday?
Do you think computers are useful? Why?
Write an email to a hotel booking a room for next weekend.
Write a reply to a friend who asked for advice on learning English.
Write a short story ending with: '...and it was the best day of my life.'
Describe your favorite movie. (100 words).
Write a complaint email about a broken phone you bought online.
Write about your daily routine.
What did you do last weekend? Write a paragraph.
Write an invitation to a dinner party.
Explain how to cook your favorite dish.
Write a thank you note to a colleague.

description: Exams 11-15 (Level B2-C1). Tập trung IELTS Writing, TOEIC Reading Part 7, Business English & IT.

exams.title: Exam 11: IELTS Writing Practice (B2+)
exams.description: Luyện tập Task 1 (Biểu đồ) và Task 2 (Nghị luận xã hội).

exams.title: Exam 12: TOEIC Reading Comprehension (Part 7)
exams.description: Đọc hiểu văn bản đơn và văn bản kép (Single & Double Passages).

exams.title: Exam 13: Business English Communication
exams.description: Từ vựng và kỹ năng giao tiếp trong môi trường công sở (Meeting, Email, Negotiation).

exams.title: Exam 14: English for IT Professionals
exams.description: Tiếng Anh chuyên ngành Công nghệ thông tin (Coding, Hardware, Network).

exams.title: Exam 15: Upper-Intermediate Grammar & Vocab (B2)
exams.description: Phrasal Verbs, Idioms và cấu trúc câu phức tạp.

questions.content_text: Task 1: The bar chart shows the monthly expenditure of an average Australian family. Summarize the information.
Task 1: The line graph illustrates the number of tourists visiting the museum between 2010 and 2020.
Task 1: The pie charts compare the energy consumption in 1990 and 2010.
Task 1: The diagram shows how recycled paper is made.
Task 1: The maps show the development of a village into a town over 50 years.
Task 1: The table gives information about student attendance at 4 different schools.
Task 2: Discuss the advantages and disadvantages of remote working.
Task 2: Some people believe that university education should be free. To what extent do you agree?
Task 2: Global warming is a serious problem. What are the causes and what solutions can you suggest?
Task 2: Do the benefits of tourism outweigh the drawbacks for local communities?
Task 2: In many countries, people are living longer. Is this a positive or negative development?
Task 2: Children today spend too much time on technology. Discuss.
Task 2: Should government invest more in arts or public services?
Task 2: The gap between the rich and the poor is widening. What problems does this cause?
Task 2: Fast food is becoming more popular. What are the effects on health?
Task 1: Summarize the differences between the two office plans.
Task 2: Should space exploration be funded by public money?
Task 2: Many languages are dying out. Why is this happening?
Task 2: Discuss the influence of celebrities on young people.
Task 2: Is it better to learn in a group or alone?
(Text: Email about meeting change) What is the purpose of the email?
(Text: Same email) Who should attend the meeting?
(Text: Advertisement for a printer) What is included in the price?
(Text: Same ad) How long is the warranty?
(Text: Business Article) The word 'lucrative' in paragraph 1 is closest in meaning to...
(Text: Same article) Why did the company expand to Asia?
(Text: Text Message Chain) When will Mr. Lee arrive?
(Text: Same text chain) Why is he late?
(Text: Double Passage - Job Ad + Email) What job is being applied for?
(Text: Same double passage) What qualification does the applicant lack?
(Text: Hotel Invoice) What extra charge appears on the bill?
(Text: Same invoice) How was the bill paid?
(Text: Memo policy change) When does the new policy start?
(Text: Same memo) Who does this apply to?
(Text: Letter of Complaint) What is the customer unhappy about?
(Text: Same letter) What does the customer want?
(Text: Conference Schedule) Which session is at 10 AM?
(Text: Same schedule) Who is the speaker for the Workshop?
(Text: Double Passage - Order form + Email) Why was the order returned?
(Text: Same double passage) How long will the refund take?
We need to ______ the budget for next year.
Could you please ______ the minutes of the meeting?
The company is facing a cash ______ crisis.
Let's ______ down to business.
We have to meet the ______ by Friday.
I'm writing with ______ to your recent enquiry.
The CEO will ______ a speech at the conference.
We need to ______ outside the box to solve this.
Please ______ attached the file you requested.
We reached a ______ after hours of negotiation.
Our market ______ has increased by 5%.
Can we ______ a meeting for next week?
I'm afraid something has ______ up, and I can't make it.
We need to ______ costs to stay competitive.
The merger will be ______ next month.
He was ______ due to poor performance.
We offer a competitive ______ package.
Let's call it a ______.
Please keep me in the ______.
Roleplay: Leave a voicemail cancelling an appointment.
You need to ______ the database to get the latest data.
The server is ______; we can't access the website.
Please ______ your code to GitHub.
A ______ is an error in the software.
We need to ______ the data to ensure security.
The ______ end handles the user interface.
HTML stands for HyperText ______ Language.
We use SQL to ______ the database.
The app is available for both iOS and ______.
Cloud ______ allows storing data online.
API stands for Application ______ Interface.
You should ______ up your data regularly.
The website is not ______ on mobile devices.
We need to fix the memory ______.
The hard ______ is full.
Please ______ the application to the server.
The bandwidth is too ______ for video streaming.
Open Source software is usually ______.
A ______ wall protects the network.
AI stands for ______ Intelligence.
Not only ______ the car, but he also broke the window.
I'd rather you ______ smoke inside.
It's high time we ______ home.
I can't put ______ with this noise anymore.
By next year, I ______ here for 10 years.
Hardly had I arrived ______ the phone rang.
The meeting was called ______ due to rain.
If I had known, I ______ you.
He took ______ his father.
She is used to ______ alone.
Please take this ______ account.
I ran ______ an old friend yesterday.
No sooner ______ left than it started raining.
We ran ______ of milk.
You'd better ______ a doctor.
He gave ______ smoking last year.
The more you study, ______ you get.
Can you look ______ my cat while I'm away?
The bomb went ______ in the city center.
Having ______ the work, he went home.

description: Exams 16-20. Tiếng Anh trẻ em, Luyện thi Đại học, Phát âm & Placement Test.

exams.title: Exam 16: English for Kids (Level 1)
exams.description: Chủ đề: Màu sắc, Con vật, Gia đình (Tương đương Starters).

exams.title: Exam 17: English for Kids (Level 2)
exams.description: Chủ đề: Trường học, Hoạt động hàng ngày (Tương đương Movers).

exams.title: Exam 18: University Entrance Mock (THPT QG)
exams.description: Ngữ âm, Trọng âm, Tìm lỗi sai, Đồng nghĩa/Trái nghĩa (Nâng cao).

exams.title: Exam 19: Pronunciation Masterclass
exams.description: Kiểm tra phát âm: Minimal pairs, Intonation, Stress.

exams.title: Exam 20: Comprehensive Placement Test
exams.description: Bài thi xếp lớp tổng hợp (A1 đến C1). Dùng để đánh giá đầu vào.

questions.content_text: What color is the apple?
It is a ______.
How many fingers?
He is my ______.
Is it a ball?
What is this? It goes 'Meow'.
I have two ______.
The sun is ______.
Can a fish fly?
This is a ______.
She ______ happy.
The elephant is ______.
It is ______ umbrella.
Where is the cat? It is ______ the box.
I like ______.
Stand ______!
My hair is ______.
What do you drink?
Goodbye!
What is he doing?
There are three ______.
We learn at ______.
Do you like pizza?
A ______ has a long neck.
I wear ______ on my feet.
______ bag is this?
She ______ got blue eyes.
We sleep in the ______.
The cat is ______ the chair.
Twelve + Two = ______.
Opposite of 'Old' is ______.
Let's ______ football.
A ______ works in a hospital.
I brush my ______.
Yesterday was ______.
I like to ______ books.
______ car is red.

questions.comment: --- QUESTIONS FOR EXAM 18 (University Entrance / THPT QG) ---

questions.content_text: Phonetics: Choose the word whose underlined part is pronounced differently.
Stress: Choose the word with a different stress pattern.
Synonym: The situation is 'precarious'.
Antonym: He was 'candid' about his mistake.
Correction: 'Neither' of the boys 'have' 'finished' 'their' homework.
Sentence: 'I didn't meet him until he called.' -> It was not until...

options.A: he called that I met him.
options.B: he called did I meet him.
options.C: I met him that he called.
options.D: he called that I meet him.

questions.content_text: Idiom: It's raining ______.
Only when you grow up ______ the truth.
Collocation: Making a mistake is not the end of the ______.
Subjunctive: It is essential that he ______ the meeting.
Phrasal Verb: I can't ______ up with his bad behavior.
Participle: ______ by the news, she started crying.
Word Form: His ______ was unexpected. (ARRIVE)
Tag Question: Let's go out, ______?
Preposition: He is addicted ______ gambling.
(Reading Cloze) Many people believe that ______ education is the key to success.
(Reading Comprehension) What can be inferred from the passage?
He asked me ______ I had finished the work.
She has a ______ for languages.
However ______, he couldn't lift the rock.
Read: 'Sheep' vs 'Ship'. (Long i vs Short i)
Read: 'Think' vs 'Sink'. (Th sound)
Read: 'Bat' vs 'Bad'. (Final consonants)
Read: 'Record' (Noun) vs 'Record' (Verb).
Intonation: 'You're coming, aren't you?' (Rising)
Read: 'Three free trees'.
Read: 'She sells seashells'.
Read: 'Water' (American vs British accent attempt).
Read: 'Vegetable' (Stress: VEG-ta-ble).
Read: 'Comfortable' (Stress: COMF-ta-ble).
Read: 'Worked', 'Played', 'Wanted'. (-ed endings)
Read: 'Cats', 'Dogs', 'Horses'. (-s endings)
Linking: 'Pick_it_up'.
Linking: 'Go_away'.
Stress: 'Pho-TOG-ra-phy'.
Stress: 'Eco-NOM-ic'.
Read: 'V' vs 'B' (Vest vs Best).
Read: 'L' vs 'R' (Light vs Right).
Sentence Stress: 'I DIDN'T say he stole the money.'
Rhythm: 'Humpty Dumpty sat on a wall'.

questions.comment: --- QUESTIONS FOR EXAM 20 (Placement Test - Mixed Levels) ---

questions.content_text: He ______ from Spain.
Red + Yellow = ______.
I ______ TV yesterday.
You wear this around your neck.
I have lived here ______ 2010.
He is ______ for the delay.
If I ______ you, I would accept.
The meeting was ______ off.
Seldom ______ seen such a thing.
A ______ argument.
Listen: What time is it?
Listen: Why is he calling?
Read: 'Out of Order'.
Read: Paragraph inference.
Write 3 sentences about your hobby.
Write an email cancelling a meeting.
Essay: Pros and Cons of Internet.
Introduce yourself.
Describe your job.
Discuss a social issue.
